entry.title: Too Good to be True
entry.summary:
Author: Belayoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,594Chapters: 6/11Kudos: 207

Summary: This is the story of how Bruce Wayne - billionaire, socialite, future CEO of Wayne Enterprises (once his father retires) - fell in love with Superman, and then Kal-El, and then Clark Kent. And it all happened because Superman saved him from a collapsing building. And the rest is history as they say. Oh and by the way, what is a ‘Bat-Man’?“Oh please,” Bruce smirked, trying to hide most of his swooning behind bravado, “Mr Wayne is my father - call me Bruce.” And in his incessant manners, held out a hand for the man to shake, while properly taking in his saviour for the first time. He was wearing a bright blue and red get up, with a large ‘S’ plastered over his chest. It was a bit garish, but Bruce could see the outline of his muscles through the tight suit, so he wasn’t complaining. The man looked surprised at Bruce’s comment before smiling timidly and shaking the outheld hand. “Superman,” he replied.Or in which Bruce Wayne lives his dream life. Or so it seems.

entry.title: Can't Stop the Feeling (or the Gay Panic)
entry.summary:
Author: fluffpuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,614Chapters: 9/10Kudos: 137

Summary: It starts with a karaoke night. Or maybe it doesn’t.Over the course of one week, a series of completely unrelated (read: wildly dramatic, suspiciously timed) events unfold across the lives of several very queer, very emotionally unstable heroes. There’s tension. There’s pining. There’s pop music. And absolutely no one is communicating.Each chapter features:✨ One ship🎶 One pop song💥 One emotional crisis💋 One bad decision (minimum!)By the time the week is over, someone’s cried to Taylor Swift, someone’s made out to Kylie Minogue, someone’s broken a window, and at least three people have had a gay awakening. Maybe the universe is trying to tell them something. Or maybe the super group chat is cursed.

entry.title: Just like a dream
entry.summary:
Author: mediaraiz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,448Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 60

Clark would like them all to stop saying that, thank you very much.

entry.title: The Seats of Stars
entry.summary:
Author: JUBE514

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,170Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 1,246

Summary: Kon-el's entry into the Royal Family is an upset. He changes the hierarchy and whispers that he could assassination the Crown Prince Jon roam the castle halls.Kon's also 13 and desperately trying to find his place in the viperous world of the royal court. He's hoping that training a taur, a wild and whipsmart colt from the Drake stables, will be just the thing to show everyone he's someone to be taken seriously.But taurs are not easy creatures to handle. They are strong and smart and not willing to be led by the weak-willed. His father Kal-El might have the strongest bond in the kingdom with his taur, Bruce, but that's no guarantee Kon will too.-----Tim has been brought to a strange place.He's been taken from the place he lived and told that he was to be the seat of a little prince. They put him in reins and saddles and expected him to bow down. He will not bow down. But also... he doesn't know what to do. His herd is gone. His mother is gone. He's alone. Except for the other taurs, the two brothers, Dick and Jason, and the frightening huge, Bruce. They offer him a family but... is this all a trick for his obedience?

entry.title: Horny error
entry.summary:
Author: Speechless_since_1998

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,341Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 180

Summary: He should have said it was none of his business. He should have done what he was good at and been an emotionally constipated asshole. But his brain wasn't in Batman mode yet, and the brain-mouth filter wasn't working. “I slept with Superman…” Dick looked at him with his mouth open, “What?” “I slept with Superman,” he repeated, still in disbelief. “And no, you don't want to know how I found out…” “Oh my God…” “I didn't know who he was when he seduced me…” “Oh my God!” “But after the third time I realized something was wrong, and it looks like someone poisoned him with a different kind of kryptonite…” “Third time? Third time of what…Oh, oh shit…”   (Bruce had been too busy lately to worry about the heroes of other cities, even the seemingly invincible aliens. But that was okay; he already had plans in case Superman went crazy. Too bad he hadn't planned for him if he accidentally slept with him.)

entry.title: break open and never close again
entry.summary:
Author: jolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,052Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 113

Summary: Batman stares, too long to be polite, too focused to be friendly, too intense to leave Clark with anything but raw heat in his belly. If Clark catches him staring, he would do well to ignore it, to chalk it up to Batman’s compulsive observation habits and nothing more. Much safer, Clark reasons, than to name the current of tension that crackles between them. The sense of rightness, the depth of hunger. Like this is what Clark has been waiting for his whole life. Like Batman can read him, and wants to be read back.

entry.title: After the Fall
entry.summary:
Author: lostinreeverie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,131Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 139

Summary: Glittering green shards raining outward in every direction, like a nail bomb. Kryptonite. Bruce’s heart stopped. He saw at least three pieces punch into Clark’s body, while the rest tore gouges into the earth, and some smashed into the buildings surrounding Centennial Park, windows shattering in sprays of glass. “No!” His voice tore out of him, raw, useless, echoing in the sterile glass office. On the television, Superman fell from the sky—then vanished beyond the camera’s field of viewOr, benched and helpless, Bruce watches the man he loves risk everything, and fears history repeating itself. Superbat Week 2025 Day 6: I thought I lost you
